desc: 225% boost to Atk, 100% boost to max HP and 30% boost to critical hit rate of Dark types, hugely boosts critical damage, hugely boosts Def, Rec when BB gauge is over 50% & enormously boosts Dark elemental damage. 25% boost to all parameters of Dark types & 20% damage reduction from Dark, Light types in Guild Raid
name: Massacre Imposition Geas
